A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I really don't see what the critics like about this film. Poor pacing\, bad story lines\, misused established characters\, misused new characters.

Killing off established characters\, killing off newly introduced characters\, the plot holes\, my GOD the plot holes. 

This movie has turned Star Wars from a cinema experience for me to a rental\, and with the way critics are falling over themselves to not piss off Disney I'll never trust a Rotten Tomatoes score again.
